title: Troll I want banned for a month
body: He trolled and fed I want him banned and people to learn never to do this again it wrecks the game completely, and i was in my promos people playy to have fun this faggot trolls and wrecks it for all of us I want him banned the issue raised to ensure this doesnt happen again.

replies.body:
For a moment there I didn't even realise which one you were talking about.

Anyway, name-and-shame isn't allowed on the board. If you want to report someone outside of the client itself, you can always submit a ticket.
